  • Method Details

    • swap

      public boolean swap​(int depotFrom, int depotTo)
      The method swaps, if possible, the resources of the given shelves
      Parameters:
      depotFrom - number of depot player wants to swap resources from
      depotTo - number of depot player wants to swap resources to

    • canMoveFromWarehouseToExtraDepot

      public boolean canMoveFromWarehouseToExtraDepot​(int depotFrom, int extraDepotTo, int quantity)
      Method used to know if an action of swapping a certain resource from a shelf of the warehouse to one of an extraDepot is valid
      Parameters:
      depotFrom - index of the shelf of the warehouse from which player wants to move resource
      extraDepotTo - index of the extra depot in which player wants to move resources
      quantity - quantity player wants to move
      Returns:
      true if the action is valid, false otherwise

    • moveFromWarehouseToExtraDepot

      public void moveFromWarehouseToExtraDepot​(int depotFrom, int extraDepotTo, int quantity)
      Method used to swap a certain resource from a shelf of the warehouse to one an extraDepot It must be called only if the method canMoveFromWarehouseToExtraDepot returns true
      Parameters:
      depotFrom - index of the shelf of the warehouse from which player wants to move resource
      extraDepotTo - index of the extra depot in which player wants to move resources
      quantity - quantity player wants to move

      Parameters:

      depotTo - index of the depot of the warehouse in which player wants to move resources
      quantity - quantity player wants to move

    • canAddResourceInWarehouse

      public boolean canAddResourceInWarehouse​(ResourceType type, int shelfIndex)
      Method used to know if a resource can be added in a shelf of the warehouse
      Parameters:
      type - type of the resource player wants to add
      shelfIndex - index of the shelf of the warehouse in which player wants to add the resource
      Returns:
      true if the action can be performed, false otherwise

    • addResource

      public void addResource​(ResourceType type, int shelfIndex)
      This method adds the given resource in the given Depot It must be called only if the method canAddResourceInWarehouse returns true
      Parameters:
      type - type of resource to add
      shelfIndex - index of the depot in which caller wants to put the resource to add

    • indexWithSameResource

      public int indexWithSameResource​(ResourceType type)
      method used to retrieve the index of the depot containing resources of the same type given as parameter
      Parameters:
      type - type of resource looking for
      Returns:
      the index of the depot containing the resource type given as parameter, DEFAULT_ERROR_NUM if not contained

    • hasEnoughResources

      public boolean hasEnoughResources​(QuantityResource requestedQuantityResource)
      Method used to know if the Warehouse has enough resources to be withdrawn
      Specified by:
      hasEnoughResources in interface ResourceSpot
      Parameters:
      requestedQuantityResource - resource requested
      Returns:
      true if the asked resource can actually be withdrawn

    • removeResourcesFromWarehouse

      public void removeResourcesFromWarehouse​(QuantityResource quantityResource)
      Method used to remove resources from the Warehouse. This method should be used after that hasEnoughResources returned true
      Parameters:
      quantityResource - resource to remove

    • addExtraDepot

      public void addExtraDepot​(ResourceType resourceType)
      Method used to add an extraDepot after the activation of a ExtraDepot LeaderCard
      Parameters:
      resourceType - type of the resource of the depot that will be created

    • canAddInExtraDepot

      public boolean canAddInExtraDepot​(ResourceType resourceType)
      This method is used to retrieve if the caller can add a given resource type in the extraDepotCard
      Parameters:
      resourceType - type of resource player wants to add
      Returns:
      true if can added, false otherwise

    • addInExtraDepot

      public void addInExtraDepot​(ResourceType resourceType)
      This method adds the given resource into the corresponding extraDepot (it should be invoked after a true result from the CanAddInExtraDepot method It must be called only if the method canAddInExtraDepot returns true
      Parameters:
      resourceType - resource to add

    • removeResourceFromExtraDepot

      public void removeResourceFromExtraDepot​(QuantityResource quantityResource)
      Method used to get a QuantityResource from the extraDepot of the same type of the quantity resource given in input
      Parameters:
      quantityResource - Resources asked to withdraw

    • extraDepotHasEnoughResources

      public boolean extraDepotHasEnoughResources​(QuantityResource quantityResource)
      Method used to know if there is an extraDepot of the given type and has enough resources to be withdrawn
      Parameters:
      quantityResource - resource to withdraw
      Returns:
      true if the resource can actually be withdrawn

    • getDepots

      public QuantityResource[] getDepots()
      Method that returns the complete status of the warehouse, including the eventual two extra depots
      Returns:
      the array of quantityResource where the current status is stored
